<MemberDefinition

Return the async function pointer address.

This should be the address of a async function pointer struct for the current async function. struct async&#95;function&#95;pointer &#123; uint32&#95;t context&#95;size; uint32&#95;t relative&#95;async&#95;function&#95;pointer; &#125;;

### getStorageSize() {#a4aa55b08cc5603ffda9ca544e37a24eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::CoroIdAsyncInst::getStorageSize () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The initial async function context size.

The fields of which are reserved for use by the frontend. The frame will be allocated as a tail of this context.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroinstr-h/#l00314">314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroinstr-h">CoroInstr.h</a>.
